question: The cost of flying has decreased significantly over the last decades. This has made oversea travel much more accessible. Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of this trend.
text: It is clear to notice that in the last tens of years the number of people flying by  plane is increased  because the prices are fallen. In this ,essay we try to show the positive and negative sides of this phenomenon.

On the one hand, growth of moving by plane has some benefits for us. Possibly, it solves a car problem. To give a clear example, most Kazakhstan people travelled by car, so in some cities such as Almaty was a huge car traffics. However, today when the cost of flying is accessible, there is less traffics in big cities. The second benefit is the development of tourism. For instance, when everyone has a possibility to buy tickets  it may improve tourism which is useful for the economy of the country and the development of people.

On the other hand, the given trend possibly leads to other problems. The first is high consumption of petrol. It means that people will increase getting of oil that can cause different pollutions and other environmental issues. The second negative side is the risk of catastrophe. For example, the rise of flying leads to increasing the number of aviacatastrophies, as there were three cases of  catastrophe in Kazakhstan in 2020. Thus, the given trend can be dangerous.

In conclusion, today because of the dropping prices of the tickets a lot of people can easily travel around the world. However, the trend has advantages such as decreasing  the traffics and development of tourism as well as disadvantages like environmental challenges and risk of aviacatastrophies.
